title: CTS Protocol
description: Cut The Shit — Human Tethering Standard for Agentic AI

what.description: The intent being requested or executed

who.description: The human stake — the mortal, finite person this is for

id.description: Identifier for the human (can be pseudonymous)

mortal.description: Acknowledgment that this is for a finite being

context.description: Optional context about who this human is and their situation

why.description: What makes this matter to the human — the meaning, the stakes, the reason

urgency.description: How time-sensitive this is to the human

chain.description: Trace of agents this request has passed through
